reviews.review_msg: Very lecture heavy and not so clear. The upside is that his courses seemed to be organized for online learning, unlike other profs but I wouldn't take his class again. I wouldn't have had any idea where to start if it hadn't been for my TA. Flemming expects a lot from first year students, if you're an english major you might enjoy it

If every professor were like Steven I wouldn't mind spending my whole life in Uni. Gives great feedback, Cares about the students, Accessible outside the class, and funny. There is a lot of reading in the course which is expected as its a literature course. I would recommend everyone to take this course.

His class was fun and interesting, everyone enjoyed his class ;D tho there are lots of books and short stories to read, midterms and finals were not that hard if you listened in class and read the books. I would say he is the best prof in fic !!! 100/10

The best class I have ever taken and I hate essay writing. Every class felt like I was just hanging out with my cool uncle. He always has a fun story to tell. You need to do lots of reading (two short novels usually plus some short stories) but you can get by by just reading summaries as long as you understand the stories.
Amazing!

He is an amazing professor, I enjoyed every single class. If you have the opportunity you should definetly take his course. If you want a good grade you should read the books and stories before class so that you can participate more during the discussion. Amazing.

Steve is the best professor I've had in my life. You throw any topic at him; he can talk to you about it for hours; his lectures are so interesting, you'd bound to be interested. He is caring and has a lot of stories. Have fun in the class.
Amazing instructor with the engaging course. He is really caring and helps students to achieve a good grades. Nothing can complain about this instructor! Highly recommend him!
Steve was amazing. I really enjoyed his lectures, very engaging and meaningful. Ps. I admire all people in reviews who get A level grades, good job!
Best Prof Ever.

actually if you are having different opinion with him, he will argue with you and prove that his are right.
if you get a different opinion with him on essay, you might get a low mark in your essay
oookooo

An acceptable choice, lectures are fine and give you something to think about afterward. But if you are looking for a high score, do not try to be creative on assignments. If he disagrees or does not understand your creativity, you will score poorly.
He does not like it when people are on their phones

Matt is a super nice instructor. He made the english literature class fun and interesting. He respects with students regarding to their cultural background. He broadens our vision. He also taught literature differently. He taught us some political science through the reading materials we had.

He's an incredible professor! He's funny and really smart. He respects your opinion and pushes you to better develop your opinions and writing skills. He gives clear criteria for the paper and ton of feedback. And super hot, btw

Absolutely hilarious, and really seems to know and be passionate about what he teaches. He didn't allow any devices in the class and also didn't upload lecture notes, so attendance and note-taking was really important. The course content was super interesting and varied and he was always cracking jokes during lecture. One of my favorite professors!
Paul's lectures were amazing and funny. I actually enjoyed coming to class because of him and he made the material really fun.

He's well-spoken, engaging and easy to follow. However he is very strict on technology in the classroom (like highschool). Any cellphone use/sound would cause a pop quiz, and there was strictly no laptop use. There were 5 stories/books assigned for the semester, given about 2 weeks per book with at most 300 pages  very heavy reading.

One of the best professors I had. Words can't even describe how cool this guy is. Patient and understanding, he values honesty and ESPECIALLY creativity. Classes are interactive and explanations are top tier. During your revision, he gives 1 to 1 advice which really helps a lot. Anybody who takes advantage of his kindness deserves an F tbhâ€¦

Best teacher that I have ever taken. One my favorite teacher. He is kind and patient. He has one workshop that literally give chance for students to correct the final exam paper. Moreover, He explained things clearly and simple to be understood

He always try his best to help his students understand the materials. He is also super accessible outside class (flexible office hrs). He is kind, caring and inspiring. Best prof I've ever had. SFU seriously needs more profs like Jordan !!!!!
He is a great professor and was always available to his students for any doubts one may have during the course.
